{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Cisco |model=RV180 |revision=W |upc=882658420436 |ean= |asin=B007RB1LQM |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/29/2011 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=P27-RV180W |ic_id=5604A-RV180W |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CNS3410 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe (half) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (half) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:C0:02 |oui_eth=00:C0:02 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N Multifunction VPN Firewall}}
[http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv180w-wireless-n-multifunction-vpn-router/index.html Product page]
This device uses a [http://www.cavium.com/processor_ECONA-ARM.html ''Cavium'' ECONA ARM SoC]. :"YYP00D-1.6" is silkscreened on the main board. :"CK7794V-0" and "YYP00N0B-1.0" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos.
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/security/security-reviews/31746-cisco-rv180-vpn-router-reviewed Cisco RV180 review on '''SNB'''] :This device's board seems to be near-identical to the [[Cisco RV180]] (non-wireless model). :The Switch in this model is assumed to be the same. :"YYP00C-1.6" is silkscreened on the RV180 board. :Single ''ESMT'' M14D5121632A-2.5B (64MB) RAM chip :used despite a place on the board for another.
===See also=== *[http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/small-business-rv-series-routers/models-comparison.html Cisco models comparison] *[[Cisco RV120W]] Wireless-N VPN Firewall *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31393-cisco-rv-120w-wireless-n-vpn-firewall-reviewed Review on '''SNB'''] • [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps10852/index.html PPage] • FCC ID: P27-RV120W :CPU: [[Cavium]] [http://www.caviumnetworks.com/OCTEON-Plus_CN50XX.html CN5010] @300MHz :Broadcom BCM5325 FE switch :64 MB of RAM and 16 MB of flash :Broadcom BCM4322 802.11bgn :2.4GHz radio ([http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31360-new-to-the-charts-cisco-rv-120w-wireless-n-vpn-firewall mini-PCI module])
*[[Cisco RV220W]] Wireless Network Security Firewall *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31456-cisco-rv220w-wireless-network-security-firewall-reviewed Review on '''SNB'''] • [http://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/routers/rv220w-wireless-network-security-firewall/index.html PPage] • FCC ID: P27RV220W :CPU: [[Cavium]] [http://www.caviumnetworks.com/OCTEON-Plus_CN50XX.html CN5010] @400MHz :Broadcom BCM53115 GbE switch :128MB of RAM and 32MB of flash :Broadcom BCM4322 802.11abgn :2.4/5GHz radio (mini-PCI module)
__NOTOC__
